attributes.action: Britain to give support to overthrow the Syrian regime
attributes.additional_details:
We, the following, believe that for evil to continue it takes good men to do nothing.

We believe that any attempt to help the people of Syria to live in peace, free from fear, intimidation and persecution is necessary as we wouldn't like to live in such circumstances.

We believe that Assad is a dictator and that the rebels defying him should be supported.

We believe that appealing to Assad’s conscience is pointless.

We believe that all tyrants should be overthrown at any cost.

We believe that armed resistance is necessary towards any regime that kills its own people, such as shooting protesters on sight as a standard action.

We support William Hague in his desire for intervention regardless of the means Mr Hague pursues. Any positive action is preferable to no action.

We, the following, have solidarity with the people of Syria and hope for better days.
